messages.title: Your verdict...
messages.content: Comments received in original correspondence, from my office. Names and addresses removed to respect the senders' privacy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our local schools have new buildings and more teachers. Our schools results are the best they have ever been.
We have more police on the beat, with crime down 7% last year and down 30% since 1997. We have local community policing across the town and more effective methods to tackle anti-social behaviour.
Over 4000 more people are employed in Leamington than in 1997. Local businesses were helped through the recession by a wide variety of government support measures.

issues.education: Our local schools have new buildings and more teachers. Our school results are the best they have ever been.
issues.health: Secure funding for our Hospital. In 1999 people waited more than 18 months for treatment - now the average is just weeks at Warwick Hospital.
issues.socialWelfare: Supporting families with Child Trust Funds.

housing.content: Crime in Leamington has fallen. We have more police on the beat, with crime down 7% last year and down 30% since 1997.

contactInformation.address: Unit 2, The Arches, Court Street, Leamington Spa

quotes.text: Our Conservative Councils demonstrate how we will run the country
quotes.source: Tory Party Chairman, Eric Pickles MP

images.caption: James Plaskitt looking out for Leamington

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet critical of local Conservative council and their decisions, contrasting with Labour government's actions.
